    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String getChromiumUserDataDir()
      Creates '.jsdt-chromium' directory in user.home for using it as '--user-data-dir' parameter witch force Chrome / Chromium to start a new browser instance, not just a new window

    • Method Detail

      • getChromiumUserDataDir

        public static java.lang.String getChromiumUserDataDir()
        Creates '.jsdt-chromium' directory in user.home for using it as '--user-data-dir' parameter witch force Chrome / Chromium to start a new browser instance, not just a new window
        Returns:
        Absolute path to '.jsdt-chromium' folder that will be used as --user-data-dir parameter
        See Also:
        --user-data-dir
